alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Lonoke; Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 03 at 2:00AM CST until March 03 at 2:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL PRAIRIE...SOUTHEASTERN LONOKE...NORTH CENTRAL JEFFERSON AND NORTHWESTERN ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 200 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Altheimer, or 15 miles southwest of Stuttgart, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Stuttgart... Humphrey... Stuttgart Municipal Airport... Brummitt... Wabbaseka... Slovak... Almyra Airport... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
